FuncDef:
The radius-test-group command creates a RADIUS test group.
The undo radius-test-group command deletes a RADIUS test group.
By default, no RADIUS test group is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the RADIUS test group name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

Examples: Info: It's successful to create an radius test group!
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The radius-test-group command is used to create a RADIUS test group. In this test group, you can configure RADIUS attributes and their values that are carried in RADIUS authentication or accounting packets to be sent using the test-aaa command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
